meanings.definition: Heat (food) again after it has already been cooked.
meanings.sent1: I will reheat the pizza in the microwave.
meanings.sent2: It is common to reheat leftovers for lunch.
meanings.sent3: My cat tried to reheat its food by sitting on it.
meanings.sent4: The sun acts like a giant microwave to reheat the Earth.
meanings.sent5: She had to reheat the soup three times before it was hot enough.

meanings.sent1: After the game, the players will reheat in the locker room.
meanings.sent2: I like to reheat my coffee in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The blanket was so cozy, I had to reheat it before bed.
meanings.sent4: His smile could reheat even the coldest of hearts.
meanings.sent5: The campfire helped us reheat after being out in the cold all day.
